entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers or drizzle ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late in the morning then west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 7 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
